snippet: Credit Suisse is said to have named Marisa Drew and Ewen Stevenson as co-heads of its investment banking operations in Europe, the Middle East and Africa.
abstract: Credit Suisse is said to have named Marisa Drew and Ewen Stevenson as co-heads of its investment banking operations in Europe, the Middle East and Africa.

headline.main: Credit Suisse Is Said to Elevate 2 Investment Bankers
